pkgmetadata.longdescription: Methods for Causal Inference with Interference // Provides methods for estimating causal effects in the presence of interference described in B. Saul and M. Hugdens (2017) doi:10.18637/jss.v082.i02. Currently it implements the inverse- probability weighted (IPW) estimators proposed by E.J. Tchetgen Tchetgen and T.J. Vanderweele (2012) doi:10.1177/0962280210386779.
